mapper.update: UPDATE place SET views = views + 1 WHERE cd = #{cd}

SELECT T1.* , C1.cd_nm AS district_nm
, C2.cd_nm AS category_nm
FROM place T1 LEFT JOIN cdmgr C1 ON ( C1.cd = 'district' AND C1.key_cd = T1.district )
LEFT JOIN cdmgr C2 ON ( C2.cd = 'food' AND C2.key_cd = T1.category )
LEFT JOIN cdmgr C2 ON ( C2.cd = 'hospital' AND C2.key_cd = T1.category )
WHERE T1.cd = #{cd}
